name: LeafCutter Bees
description:
A cute educational game about the life cycle of leafcutter bees (Megachile centuncularis)

Made in two weeks for My First Game Jam: Winter 2022

The theme was nature

The game has no sound (bees aren't deaf but I didn't have time to put sound )

---------------------------------------- How to play

- Press B to interact with the world  (It's not a pun, I swear)

- Objectives are marked with dashed circles

- If you feel lost try to interact with the environment

---------------------------------------- Cool info about leafcutter bees

Life Cycle

General information

Leafcutter bees being exploited for the benefit of the dairy industry
